definitions: To reveal a secret or information that was meant to be kept private.
To donate something to someone else, often without expecting anything in return.
To present the bride to the groom at a wedding ceremony.
To lose a game or competition through a mistake or poor performance.
examples: Don't give away the surprise party!
They decided to give away all their old clothes to charity.
Her father will give her away at the wedding.
The team gave away the lead in the final minutes.
